$interpreted: Yamitsuki: The monsters have all left...?
Surprised Demihuman Soldier: It's awful. They're all dead...
Relaxed Demihuman Soldier: Phew, luckily Nigel stopped us from getting swept up into it, just in time.
Puzzled Demihuman Soldier: Does this mean we won...?
Nigel: ...Everybody, go see whether the monsters really have all left. We'll take care of the rest later.
Nigel: (Obliterated by monsters... Is this really how it ends...? Has fate finally turned its face from us...?)
Nigel: That voice...!
Nigel: Angelia?!
Angelia: Ni...gel...
Nigel: Hey, hold on!
Nigel: Angelia... You're...?!
Angelia: Please... The rest... is up... to you...
Yamitsuki: She... She's dead?
Surprised Demihuman Soldier: The Sun Queen... is dead?
Nigel: ......
Yamitsuki: Nigel...?
Nigel: ......
Nigel: ...Sigh...
Nigel: Fellow citizens of Atlas...Listen closely and take to heart every word that I'm about to say.
Nigel: Angelia... The Kingdom of the Sun did not come here to attack us—but to support Atlas.
Puzzled Demihuman Soldier: What?! How could that be!
Surprised Demihuman Soldier: Yeah! Since when did the Kingdom of the Sun have such a good conscience?!
Nigel: Silence!
Nigel: I know it's hard to believe, but the facts are plain to see.
Nigel: Queen Angelia sensed that the monsters were coming to beseige Atlas, and so she lead her troops here in person.
Nigel: She was prepared to make every sacrifice... to keep Atlas safe.
Nigel: Angelia, Queen of the Kingdom of the Sun, has paid her debt of blood. From this day forth, let there be no grievances between Atlas and the Kingdom of the Sun.
Nigel: Atlas! Salute the Sun Queen!
: Greetings, Uncle.
: I'm entrusting this letter to Naya. By the time you read it, I expect the dust will all have settled.
: The sect, the Twelve Noble Houses, the feud with Atlas... I hope that I have succeeded in taking them all to the grave with me.
: I've been faced with impossible choices, Uncle, just as you were. In the end, I chose to make a third path.
: To smash the system, to let the setting sun rise again, to let everything—begin anew.
: These are decisions that I've had no choice but to make, just as you had no choice but to make yours.
: Once again, we are bound to face one another with our blades raised. Only then do we come to understand each other.
: —This is my fate.
: I don't regret making an enemy of you. If I could do it over and over, this is still the choice I would have to make.
: ...But I do truly regret that before that moment arrived, I couldn't express my love, gratitude, and affection for you more.
: Thank you, Uncle, for raising me. I grew up by watching from over your shoulder.
: All my life, you have always been the most important person... even now.
: —I wish you well. Farewell.
Theodore: ...Revising history, inventing legends and fabricating heros... You've done your duty for the Carlos royal family now, Angelia...
Theodore: ...You've done well... You've none of William's feebleness... You deserve to be called my own child...
Theodore: My own child...
Elio: ...Urgh...
Elio: (Guh... I'm still alive...? I remember... an explosion...)
Elio: (Did I... Did I fall from the library? So, there's a secret room concealed beneath it... I wonder who left all this here...)
Elio: (It's so dark, I can't see a thing... Isn't there a lantern, or a torch...)
Elio: Wait...!
Elio: (...It's the flower I saw in the book...)
Elio: (This mural feels so ancient... Huh? There's an inscription...)
Elio: "—Dedicated to our most beloved Sdorica... The world is Sdorica, as Sdorica is the world."
Elio: "Let the four seasons ever renew, the birds and beasts sing and praise, and humanity be born in love. With this Eternal Flower do we thank thee for thine nurturing."
Elio: ...Nurturing? What the... This Sdorica is nothing like the evil dragon spoken of in the legends...
Elio: "Through the language of the Eternal Flower, I shall believe in immortality."
Elio: "With this flower, we swear that our reverence shall never wither."
Elio: "...In our undying lives, may we forever be..."
Elio: "—In Sdorica's presence residing."

: Long, long ago,
Before the age of legends,

: There lived an ancient dragon, Sdorica, guardian of the world,
who watched over the "humans".

: Sdorica activated its core to share its power,
And teach humankind to use Soul Energy, thereby blessing them with eternal life.

: However...
Dragons and humans are incapable of understanding each other, which led to conflict.
: This angered the ancient dragon, who then decided to withdraw its power.

: But the greedy humans refused to let go of this Soul Energy,
And were led by the strongest Immortal among them: Vendacti.
: Vendacti eventually fell the ancient dragon and snatched its core.

: She gripped her long sword
And pierced it deep into the dragon's heart.
: But with the dragon's core ripped from its vessel, the world was forever changed as all Soul Energy grew unstable.
: An eternal night rolled in, while day retreated forevermore.
: Without the dragon and its knowledge,

: The flow of Soul Energy gave birth to new landforms and creatures,
An eternally changing existence.
: Thousands of years rolled on,

: A new world slowly sprang forth,
Along with false legends.
: But something lurks in the shadows,

: Those who yearn for the return of that great dragon,
And were long supressed by Vendacti,
: Never cease in their dreams of reviving Sdorica and return to the eternal homeland.

Model.Text: The monsters have all left...?
It's awful. They're all dead...
Phew, luckily Nigel stopped us from getting swept up into it, just in time.
Does this mean we won...?
...Everybody, go see whether the monsters really have all left. We'll take care of the rest later.
(Obliterated by monsters... Is this really how it ends...? Has fate finally turned its face from us...?)
Ugh...
That voice...!
Angelia?!
Ni...gel...
Hey, hold on!
Angelia... You're...?!
Please... The rest... is up... to you...
She... She's dead?
The Sun Queen... is dead?
Nigel...?
...Sigh...
Fellow citizens of Atlas...Listen closely and take to heart every word that I'm about to say.
Angelia... The Kingdom of the Sun did not come here to attack us—but to support Atlas.
What?! How could that be!
Yeah! Since when did the Kingdom of the Sun have such a good conscience?!
Silence!
I know it's hard to believe, but the facts are plain to see.
Queen Angelia sensed that the monsters were coming to beseige Atlas, and so she lead her troops here in person.
She was prepared to make every sacrifice... to keep Atlas safe.
Angelia, Queen of the Kingdom of the Sun, has paid her debt of blood. From this day forth, let there be no grievances between Atlas and the Kingdom of the Sun.
Atlas! Salute the Sun Queen!
Greetings, Uncle.
I'm entrusting this letter to Naya. By the time you read it, I expect the dust will all have settled.
The sect, the Twelve Noble Houses, the feud with Atlas... I hope that I have succeeded in taking them all to the grave with me.
I've been faced with impossible choices, Uncle, just as you were. In the end, I chose to make a third path.
To smash the system, to let the setting sun rise again, to let everything—begin anew.
These are decisions that I've had no choice but to make, just as you had no choice but to make yours.
Once again, we are bound to face one another with our blades raised. Only then do we come to understand each other.
—This is my fate.
I don't regret making an enemy of you. If I could do it over and over, this is still the choice I would have to make.
...But I do truly regret that before that moment arrived, I couldn't express my love, gratitude, and affection for you more.
Thank you, Uncle, for raising me. I grew up by watching from over your shoulder.
All my life, you have always been the most important person... even now.
—I wish you well. Farewell.
...Revising history, inventing legends and fabricating heros... You've done your duty for the Carlos royal family now, Angelia...
...You've done well... You've none of William's feebleness... You deserve to be called my own child...
My own child...
...Urgh...
(Guh... I'm still alive...? I remember... an explosion...)
(Did I... Did I fall from the library? So, there's a secret room concealed beneath it... I wonder who left all this here...)
(It's so dark, I can't see a thing... Isn't there a lantern, or a torch...)
Wait...!
(...It's the flower I saw in the book...)
(This mural feels so ancient... Huh? There's an inscription...)
"—Dedicated to our most beloved Sdorica... The world is Sdorica, as Sdorica is the world."
"Let the four seasons ever renew, the birds and beasts sing and praise, and humanity be born in love. With this Eternal Flower do we thank thee for thine nurturing."
...Nurturing? What the... This Sdorica is nothing like the evil dragon spoken of in the legends...
"Through the language of the Eternal Flower, I shall believe in immortality."
"With this flower, we swear that our reverence shall never wither."
"...In our undying lives, may we forever be..."
"—In Sdorica's presence residing."

Long, long ago,
Before the age of legends,

There lived an ancient dragon, Sdorica, guardian of the world,
who watched over the "humans".

Sdorica activated its core to share its power,
And teach humankind to use Soul Energy, thereby blessing them with eternal life.

However...
Dragons and humans are incapable of understanding each other, which led to conflict.
This angered the ancient dragon, who then decided to withdraw its power.

But the greedy humans refused to let go of this Soul Energy,
And were led by the strongest Immortal among them: Vendacti.
Vendacti eventually fell the ancient dragon and snatched its core.

She gripped her long sword
And pierced it deep into the dragon's heart.
But with the dragon's core ripped from its vessel, the world was forever changed as all Soul Energy grew unstable.
An eternal night rolled in, while day retreated forevermore.
Without the dragon and its knowledge,

The flow of Soul Energy gave birth to new landforms and creatures,
An eternally changing existence.
Thousands of years rolled on,

A new world slowly sprang forth,
Along with false legends.
But something lurks in the shadows,

Those who yearn for the return of that great dragon,
And were long supressed by Vendacti,
Never cease in their dreams of reviving Sdorica and return to the eternal homeland.

This Sdorica is nothing like the evil dragon spoken of in the legends...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_sp3_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":""Through the language of the Eternal Flower, I shall believe in immortality."","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_sp3_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":""With this flower, we swear that our reverence shall never wither."","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_sp3_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":""...In our undying lives, may we forever be..."","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_sp3_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":""—In Sdorica's presence residing."","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"Long, long ago,
Before the age of legends,","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_001","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"There lived an ancient dragon, Sdorica, guardian of the world,
who watched over the "humans".","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_002","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"Sdorica activated its core to share its power,
And teach humankind to use Soul Energy, thereby blessing them with eternal life.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_003","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"However...
Dragons and humans are incapable of understanding each other, which led to conflict.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_004","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"This angered the ancient dragon, who then decided to withdraw its power.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_005","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"But the greedy humans refused to let go of this Soul Energy,
And were led by the strongest Immortal among them: Vendacti.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_006","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"Vendacti eventually fell the ancient dragon and snatched its core.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_007","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"She gripped her long sword
And pierced it deep into the dragon's heart.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_008","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"But with the dragon's core ripped from its vessel, the world was forever changed as all Soul Energy grew unstable.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_009","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"An eternal night rolled in, while day retreated forevermore.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_010","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"Without the dragon and its knowledge,","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_011","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"The flow of Soul Energy gave birth to new landforms and creatures,
An eternally changing existence.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_012","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"Thousands of years rolled on,","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_013","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"A new world slowly sprang forth,
Along with false legends.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_014","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"But something lurks in the shadows,","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_015","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"Those who yearn for the return of that great dragon,
And were long supressed by Vendacti,","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_412_005_dialog_english##_31_016","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"Never cease in their dreams of reviving Sdorica and return to the eternal homeland.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
